text: On July 7 2023, a shooting happened at a mosque in Bekka Valley, Lebanon. After the gunshots were heard, the state news agency reported that armed forces had arrived at the site. == References == Category:2023 mass shootings Category:2023 in Asia Category:2020s in Lebanon Category:July 2023 events Category:2020s mass shootings in Asia Category:Attacks on mosques Category:Attacks on religious buildings and structures in Asia Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the 2020s
title: 2023 Lebanon mosque shooting
